name: Objectives
description: Basic introduction to the course and its objectives.

lessons.name: Introduction to Course
lessons.description: Overview of the course structure and goals.

lessons.name: What is Web Development?
lessons.description: Introduction to web development and technologies used.

lessons.name: Setting Up the Environment
lessons.description: Setting up the development environment for full stack projects.

name: Prototyping the React Kambaz UI with HTML
description: Learn to create UI prototypes using HTML and React components.

lessons.name: Learn to Create User Interface
lessons.description: Building the initial UI structure using HTML.

lessons.name: Keep Working on the Assignment
lessons.description: Incrementally develop the course assignment.

lessons.name: Deploy the Assignment
lessons.description: Deploy your first React assignment online.

name: Styling Web Pages with CSS and Bootstrap
description: Learn CSS fundamentals and Bootstrap styling for responsive design.

lessons.name: Introduction to CSS
lessons.description: Basics of CSS for styling web pages.

lessons.name: Selectors by Tag and ID
lessons.description: Understanding CSS selectors for targeting elements.

lessons.name: Color and Background Color
lessons.description: Applying colors, backgrounds, and themes to pages.

name: Introduction to Data Science
description: Overview of data science concepts and tools.

lessons.name: Data Science Basics
lessons.description: Understanding what data science is and its applications.

lessons.name: Data Wrangling
lessons.description: Techniques to clean and prepare datasets.

lessons.name: Data Visualization
lessons.description: Visualizing data using charts and graphs.

lessons.name: Loading Datasets
lessons.description: Learn to load datasets into your environment.

lessons.name: Analyzing Data
lessons.description: Perform basic data analysis and insights.

lessons.name: Creating Dashboards
lessons.description: Build interactive dashboards to display data insights.

name: Introduction to Cloud Computing
description: Learn the basics of cloud computing concepts.

lessons.name: Cloud Basics
lessons.description: Understand IaaS, PaaS, SaaS and cloud principles.

lessons.name: Deploying a Cloud App
lessons.description: Deploy a simple application on a cloud provider.

lessons.name: Managing Cloud Resources
lessons.description: Learn how to manage and monitor cloud resources.

name: Advanced Cloud Concepts
description: Deep dive into cloud services and architecture.

lessons.name: Scaling Applications
lessons.description: Techniques to scale cloud applications efficiently.

lessons.name: Security in the Cloud
lessons.description: Learn best practices for securing cloud apps.

lessons.name: Monitoring and Logging
lessons.description: Implement monitoring and logging for cloud systems.

name: Programming Design Principles
description: Learn design paradigms including OOP and functional programming.

lessons.name: Object-Oriented Programming
lessons.description: Introduction to OOP concepts and design.

lessons.name: Functional Programming Basics
lessons.description: Learn functional programming concepts.

lessons.name: Design Patterns
lessons.description: Introduction to common software design patterns.

name: Algorithms and Problem Solving
description: Study of algorithms, data structures, and problem solving.

lessons.name: Introduction to Algorithms
lessons.description: Basic concepts and analysis of algorithms.

lessons.name: Sorting and Searching
lessons.description: Learn common sorting and searching algorithms.

lessons.name: Problem Solving Techniques
lessons.description: Practice problem solving using algorithms.

name: Foundations of Artificial Intelligence
description: Introduction to AI concepts and techniques.

lessons.name: AI Basics
lessons.description: Understanding AI principles and applications.

lessons.name: Search and Logic
lessons.description: Introduction to search algorithms and logic reasoning.

lessons.name: Learning Algorithms
lessons.description: Basics of machine learning algorithms.

lessons.name: Graphics Basics
lessons.description: Understand 2D and 3D graphics principles.

lessons.name: Rendering and Animation
lessons.description: Learn how to render and animate graphics.

lessons.name: Interactive Visuals
lessons.description: Create interactive visual elements using WebGL and React.
